select count(*) from product
where pbrand like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") or pename like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") or pkname like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") or pmodel like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
select s.*,u.*,p.pename,p.pkname,p.pimage,p.pmodel from sell s, product p, user u where smodel=pmodel and ssize=#{ssize} and pmodel=#{pmodel} and sout='0' and uid=#{uid} order by ssell limit 0,1
select b.*,p.pename,p.pkname,p.pimage,p.pmodel from buy b, product p where bmodel=pmodel and bsize=#{bsize} and pmodel=#{pmodel} and bout='0' order by bprice limit 0,1
select * from sell where sout=5 and smodel=#{smodel} order by sdate desc limit 0,8
select * from buy where bout=5 and bmodel=#{bmodel} order by bdate desc limit 0,8
